author: Bill Flanagan
title: US Congress Honors Counter Terrorism Expert and World Patent Marketing Advisory Board Member, General Nitzan Nuriel, During Week of September 11
text:
World Patent Marketing, a vertically integrated manufacturer and distributor of patented products, announced that Advisory Board Member, Brig. Gen (Res.) Nitzan Nuriel, received an Honorary Citation from the United States Congress on Monday, Sept. 7, 2015, for outstanding contributions to world security and counter-terrorism. "We are thrilled," said Scott J. Cooper, CEO and Creative Director of World Patent Marketing. "A Congressional Citation is a huge honor. Then again, Nitzan has had an amazing career, he has been an exceptional leader in the war on global terror. He has one of the quickest minds I have ever come across and a profound knowledge of the issues involved. Good job Nitzan, we couldn't be more proud to have you as a colleague and Board Member."
The award was presented by Congressman Peter T. King, former Chairman and ranking member of the Committee on Homeland Security, on the first day of the prestigious World Summit on Counter-Terrorism, held by the International Institute of Counter-Terrorism (ICT). This was the ICT's 15th International conference and it was attended by over 1,000 of the world's top decision makers in defense, intelligence, and security. 60 countries were in attendance. The Conference was held at the Sharon Hotel and the IDC in Herzilya.
Congressman King announced that Nuriel was honored with this prestigious award because of his work in supporting the International Institute for Counter-Terrorism from its inception in 1996, five years before September 11, 2001. Nuriel was one of the earliest advocates and supporters of the important project, which sought to bring together leaders of the intelligence, diplomatic and defense communities for communication and information. Throughout Nuriel’s career he has been known for his leadership and advocacy of the necessity to take a firm stand on terrorism to increase global security and safety.
Nuriel is currently a Research Fellow at the International Institute of Counter-Terrorism. From 2007 to 2012 he was the Director of the Counter-Terrorism Board under the Israeli Prime Minister's Office.
As a young man he served in the Israeli Defense Force, and rose through the ranks of command to eventually obtain the title of Brigadier General. Among his positions, he was posted as Military Attaché to the Israeli Embassy in Washington DC, where he served as the official liaison between the US Military, Marine Corps, Special Operations Command, FEMA and Homeland Security. He received the Legion of Merit from the President of the United States for his accomplishments in maintaining promoting world security.
World Patent Marketing offers the warmest congratulations to Advisory Board Member Nitzan Nuriel.
About World Patent Marketing
World Patent Marketing is a vertically integrated manufacturer and engineer of patented products. The company is broken into eight operating divisions. These include WPM Research, WPM Patents, WPM Web & Apps, WPM Prototyping, WPM Manufacturing, WPM Capital Ventures, WPM Social Media and WPM Retail. The company offers these products to inventors, law firms and emerging growth companies.
WPM Research: evaluates the commercial potential of patents through its proprietary study, The Patent Invention Technical Analysis (PITA).
WPM Patents: develops intellectual property strategies, writes and files patent applications with the US Patent and Trademark Office and other patent offices around the world.
WPM Web & Apps: offers complete development services for web site and mobile apps, including: research, design, code, application of skins, testing, and distribution. Also offers top quality design and artwork, a necessary element in the crowded field of web site and mobile apps.
WPM Prototyping: works with clients to develop one or more types of prototype, including: appearance, proof of concept, functional model or a production level prototype.
WPM Manufacturing: provides overseas production from all 14 major industrial zones in China, Taiwan and South Korea. Having access to a staff on the ground in China makes all the difference in achieving the best price, quality, and turnaround time.
WPM Capital Ventures: provides seed funding for startups. Seed funding is the earliest stage of venture funding. WPM's goal is to get you through the first phase. This usually means: get you to the point where you’ve built something impressive enough to raise money on a larger scale. Then we can introduce you to later stage investors—or occasionally even acquirers.
WPM Social Media: has created an innovative, specialized approach that we use to power social media marketing for some of the world's best brands. Brands choose us because, as one of the world's most innovative companies, we know how to turn business objectives into realities in creative, strategic and measurable ways.
WPM Retail: Offers shopping online, in person, on mobile devices and with social media. To be successful today, companies need to be able to sell products in as many different ways as possible.
